questions.question_text: What types of tasks are specific to the Audit module? (Choose four.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AC
Answer:
 A. Expiration
 C. Reassignment
Explanation: there are 4 notifications OOB related to Audit Task[sn_audit_task]
 - Notify audit task confidential users
 - Notify current assingee task expired | A.
 - Notify assignee before due date
 - Change assigned to of audit task | C.
Source: PDI, sysevent_email_action list view, with filter: sys_scope.nameLIKEGrc^collection=sn_audit_task

comments.content: Change assigned to of audit task

discussion.content:
A and C is the correct answer - 
 Notify current assingee task expired
 Notify current assingee task expired

C is correct doubt on another one

https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/utah-governance-risk-compliance/page/product/grc-audit/concept/c_AuditTasks.html

When audit tasks are created or reassigned, a notification is sent to the assigned user. A notification is also sent when the task reaches 75% of its planned duration.

comments.content: Yup, confirmed this on the SN docs.

questions.question_text: What baseline criteria determine when notifications are triggered in relation to audit tasks? (Choose two.)
What minimum role is needed to bulk initiate risk assessments using the risk assessment scheduler?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
A risk manager can then identify the entities and the risks within the entities for bulk initiation of risk assessments. The question is asking about who can initiate bulk assessments.

comments.content: sorry i meant D not C.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
What minimum role is needed to bulk initiate risk assessments using the risk assessment scheduler?
 A. sn_grc.business_user
 B. sn_risk.user
 C. sn_risk.admin
 D. sn_risk.manager
Answer: C. sn_risk.admin
Explanation: quote: "Create a risk assessment scheduler and assign it to the risk manager. A risk manager can then identify the entities and the risks within the entities for bulk initiation of risk assessments."
Source: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/xanadu-governance-risk-compliance/page/product/grc-risk/concept/risk-assessment-scheduler.html

D is correct. 

"Create a risk assessment scheduler and assign it to the risk manager. A risk manager can then identify the entities and the risks within the entities for bulk initiation of risk assessments."
